review: One of the best games I have ever played. I love to go back and punch leland in the face all the time. Im sad that there isnt many games like this that are this good.

When I saw people playing this it looked extremely fun but now that I have it, it doesent seem very fun at all to me. During the 1.5 hours I spent playing this I had some fun but it got boring after awhile. For about half of the time I spent playing this game I was gettng gltched out it in ways that didnt make sense (ex: I was trying to swim and I started spinning around over and over for no reason). Maybe it's because im a boring person or its becuase this game is extremely crappy and stupid, but I don't like it.

This game is amazingly beautiful and has an immense and dramatic story. I strongly reccomend this game to anyone that has a pc. each episode of Life is Strange is about maybe 2-6 hours depending on whether or not you rewind alot and want to get all of the optional photos. I don't want to reveal anything to anyone who hasn't played it or watched it because it may ruin it for them but, I will say that there is so many different choices that it makes it seem that the there is tons of different endings and kinda seems like 'Heavy Rain'.
Spore is the best Life Simulation game I have ever played and i highly recomenned Spore to people who haven't played it. :)
it is very fun but it costs too much money for everything but i dought anyone would want to buy every DLC
